name: Policy Pass Status
queries: sum(policy_report_result{policy=~"$policy", category=~"$category", severity=~"$severity", source=~"$source", kind=~"$kind", namespace=~"$namespace", status="pass" } > 0) by (namespace)

name: Policy Fail Status
queries: sum(policy_report_result{policy=~"$policy", category=~"$category", severity=~"$severity", source=~"$source", kind=~"$kind", namespace=~"$namespace", status="fail" } > 0) by (namespace)

name: Policy Warning Status
queries: sum(policy_report_result{policy=~"$policy", category=~"$category", severity=~"$severity", source=~"$source", kind=~"$kind", namespace=~"$namespace", status="warn" } > 0) by (namespace)

name: Policy Error Status
queries: sum(policy_report_result{policy=~"$policy", category=~"$category", severity=~"$severity", source=~"$source", kind=~"$kind", namespace=~"$namespace", status="error" } > 0) by (namespace)

name: Status Timeline
queries: sum(policy_report_result{policy=~"$policy", category=~"$category", severity=~"$severity", source=~"$source", kind=~"$kind", namespace=~"$namespace" } > 0) by (status, namespace)

name: Passed Resources
queries: sum(policy_report_result{policy=~"$policy", category=~"$category", severity=~"$severity", source=~"$source", kind=~"$kind", namespace=~"$namespace", status="pass" }) by (namespace,category,policy,rule,kind,name,severity,status,source )

name: Failed Resources
queries: sum(policy_report_result{policy=~"$policy", category=~"$category", severity=~"$severity", source=~"$source", kind=~"$kind", namespace=~"$namespace", status="fail" }) by (namespace,category,policy,rule,kind,name,severity,status,source)

name: Warning Resources
queries: sum(policy_report_result{policy=~"$policy", category=~"$category", severity=~"$severity", source=~"$source", kind=~"$kind", namespace=~"$namespace", status="warn" }) by (namespace,category,policy,rule,kind,name,severity,status,source )

name: Errored Resources
queries: sum(policy_report_result{policy=~"$policy", category=~"$category", severity=~"$severity", source=~"$source", kind=~"$kind", namespace=~"$namespace", status="error" }) by (namespace,category,policy,rule,kind,name,severity,status,source )
